mapper.select: SELECT p.post_no postNo ,p.cate_no cateNo ,p.post_title postTitle ,c.id id ,c.name userName ,p.post_content postContent ,TO_CHAR(p.reg_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') regDate FROM post p, (SELECT c.cate_no cateNo, c.id id, u.user_name name FROM users u, category c WHERE u.id = c.id ) c WHERE p.cate_no = c.cateNo AND p.post_no = #{postNo}

SELECT p.post_no postNo FROM post p, (SELECT ROWNUM, c.cate_no cateNo FROM users u, category c WHERE u.id = c.id AND c.cate_no = #{cateNo} ORDER BY c.cate_no DESC ) c WHERE p.cate_no = c.cateNo AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT p.post_no postNo ,c.cate_no cateNo ,p.post_title postTitle ,TO_CHAR(p.reg_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') regDate FROM category c, post p WHERE c.cate_no = p.cate_no AND c.cate_no = #{cateNo} ORDER BY p.post_no DESC
